title: What would you name your K-pop girl group? - Quora

response.answer_text: RZ-169. I really like this name. I think its cool and unique. I found it on a website called, fantasy name generator. I was looking for galaxy names and this name popped up.WTF. This name will make people go “tf…?” after hearing it and I think it is cool lol. Also, the band's name will be everywhere naturally. People use this term a lot haha. Its weird but good anyway. It may be an ancronym for What The Fudge or something else.Idk I think I should stop before I make a bigger fool of myself. I will add more if I come up with something more eligible and not so…ahem. I think the best band and fandom names have already been taken, BTS and ARMY♡ FIGHTING! Ayo! I came back with more! The lame ones are made by me and others, I found on Quotev. Emblems. Emblems was one of the muses in Greek Mythology.Rose gold (by me). Because some people like simple and uncreative names. And also because I am lame.Neptune (by me). I don't know. I don't know myself, why I bother.gPOP (by me). It will stand for Girl Pop?Wonderland (by me). If the group debuts with a fantasy or unique concept. I tried.Okay, these are the good ones. I found these on Quotev, I will mention the usernames of the rightful owners :) These are by: Kim ByeolBLM DestinyL.O.L (Love Or Life)Rose QuartzThree WishesBy: Tae's Kookie EmeraldBy: glitter VivacityPeriwinkleSilver MistThats it! Stay Safe! Stay Gold!

DREAMDAY (Hangul: 드림다이); fandom name is OneDream. Because it means that DREAMDAY and the fans (Dreams) are One. Blue Sky (Hangul: 브루 스가이); fandom name is MySky. Because they are what Blue Sky think of whenever they look up to the sky, their fans. Sunrise (Hangul: 손리스); fandom name Sunset. ORA (Hangul: none); fandom name Aura. Cos it sounds like ORA and gives ORA their ‘aura’ on stage. Lilies (Hangul: 리리스); fandom name Alstro. Because there’s a type of lily (Peruvian lily) that means friendship and devotion, and it’s scientific name is alstroemeria, so the first bit became the fandom name. Stargazer (Hangul: 스타개자); fandom name Pink. Because there’s a lily called stargazer lily, and the pink version means prosperity. Pink is also the colour of hearts, and the sky (so, connects to stars) can become pink too. I hope this helped! What are you using this for? And also, any group that is actually named this, I apologise, I didn’t know. I think these are all not taken.
